pp_flask_elements_description: You feel resistant to lost forms of magic. Increase resistance to Spirit and Lightning attacks for 5 min.
pp_flask_fort_description: Your skin feels like stone. Greatly increases your fortification for 5 min.
pp_flask_magelight_description: You feel funny, your skin starts to glow. Grants the user Magelight for a short time.
pp_flask_secondwind_description: You feel lighter on your feet, running and jumping stamina reduced over 2 min and improved stamina regeneration.
pp_flask_god_description: Touched by the light of Odin you feel rejuvenated. Healing you instantly for 250 health and improved health regeneration.
pp_elixir_healing_description: You feel rejuvenated. A powerful force healing you for 95 health over 10 seconds.
pp_elixir_spiritual_description: Overwhelming healing power, heals you instantly for 100 health.
pp_elixir_stam_description: A powerful Elixir that restores 150 Stamina over 15 seconds.
pp_elixir_stealth_description: Greatly increases your sneak ability for 60 seconds, you feel...  sneaky
pp_potion_healing_description: You feel a wave of healing, 45 Health over 10 seconds.
pp_potion_spiritual_description: You feel a powerful healing surge flow through you healing you instantly for 50 health.
pp_potion_stam_description: You are gifted with more energy,  Instantly restores 90 Stamina.
pp_vial_healing_description: Is this thing working?  I feel.. better.. Restores 25 health over 10 seconds.
pp_vial_spiritual_description: A lesser healing potion,  heals for 25 Health.
pp_vial_stam_description: You gain a second wind, instantly restoring 45 stamina.
pp_plilstone_black_description: A mysterious stone of unknown powers.
pp_plilstone_blue_description: A mysterious stone of unknown powers.
pp_plilstone_red_description: A mysterious stone of unknown powers.
pp_plilstone_green_description: A mysterious stone of unknown powers.
pp_plilstone_purple_description: A mysterious stone of unknown powers.
pp_potion_cauldron_description: A special Cauldron for crafting Potion Base
pp_potion_mead_description: A special Mead developed as a base for higher quality potions.
pp_potion_skill_description: A form of chemistry and speculative philosophy that attempts to discover elixirs and a method for transmuting base metals into gold.
